Posters for Kimjongilia show published 
    Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA)  -- Posters for the 5th Kimjongilia Show have been produced.
 Among them are posters depicting Kimjongilia, a flower of sun, against the background of firecrackers displayed on jong il peak, the holy peak of Korea, and Kimjongilia in full bloom drawn against the background of monumental edifices of the era.   
 Seen on the posters is a slogan "Long Live General Kim Jong Il, Sun of 21st Century " all posters bear letters "Celebration, February 16" on their upper parts, "Fifth Kimjongilia Show" on their lower parts and at their bottoms a notice that the show will be held at the Grand People's Study house from February 14 to 20, Juche 90 (2001).

articles.content:
10th International figure-skating festival for "Paektusan Cup" to open 
    Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The tenth international figure-skating festival for "Paektusan Cup" will be held in Pyongyang  with large attendance on the occasion of the February holiday. 
 The festival which will bring together ace figure-skaters from various countries and the DPRK will involve single (man and woman), pair and ice dance and demonstration performance.    
 The festival, an annual event since Juche 81 (1992), has proved to be a significant sports festival as it reflects the unanimous aspiration and desire of all peoples to celebrate the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il as the most auspicious holiday common to humankind.

articles.title: Joint New Year editorial supported in Bangladesh
Stockbreeding makes progress
articles.content:
Joint New Year editorial supported in Bangladesh 
    Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on January 19 in support of the joint editorial of newspapers Rodong Sinmun, Josoninmingun and Chongnyonjonwi "Let's open our way through the new century in the spirit of the victorious 'arduous march'".
 The statement warmly welcomed the idea and spirit set forth in the joint editorial and wished the Korean people great success in the drive to implement it.    
 The statement hoped that all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad would work hard for the implementation of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration irrespective of idea, system, political view and religious belief.
